cn.releaseNotes:
New Features

* WEATHER INTEGRATION: Set your location in the settings to unlock current weather data.

* WEATHER CONDITIONS IN WORKFLOWS: Use live weather data like temperature, humidity, precipitation (amount & probability), UV index, cloud cover, wind speed and visibility as conditions in your Workflows.

* NEW START EVENTS: Trigger Workflows at sunrise or sunset – perfect for automating your home around natural light.

* NEW STEPS: Add more control to your automations with repeat loops and a new wait step that pauses execution until a specific time. You can also just stop an execution.

* RELATIVE VALUE CONTROL & TOGGLE ACCESSORIES: Dynamically increase or decrease device states – like boosting brightness by 10% – or toggle accessories without setting a specific target value.

* SMART FOLDERS FOR WORKFLOWS: Create intelligent folders to quickly filter and organize your Workflows. We’ve also added text search, so you can find what you need even faster.

* ERROR HANDLING: In the Workflow settings, you can now assign a device to be notified in case a Workflow execution fails.

Improvements

* HUB MODE ON MAC: Hub Mode can now be enabled on your Mac.

* ENHANCED WORKFLOW UI: We’ve refined the look and feel of IF/ELSE steps and improved how you add conditions and actions.

* MULTI-DEVICE ACTIONS: A single step can now control multiple devices and their properties, making complex automations even easier to build.

Update now and bring smarter, more dynamic automation to your Apple Home!
cn.description:
Experience and control your Apple Home in a whole new way with Controller for HomeKit. Our app combines all the familiar HomeKit features with numerous additional enhancements, offering you a user-friendly interface, unparalleled control, and flexibility.

* FLOOR PLAN: Create a detailed floor plan of your home using the LiDAR sensor on your iPhone or iPad and control your HomeKit accessories directly through the floor plan.
* COMPLEX AUTOMATIONS: Utilize advanced triggers and conditions for custom automations that are perfectly tailored to your needs.
* NOTIFICATIONS: Create custom notifications to stay informed about important events in your home.
* BACKUPS: Secure your setup and restore it easily when needed.
* SMART FOLDERS: Organize your devices and automations effortlessly with smart folders and custom filters.
* WORKFLOWS: Optimize your daily routines with workflows that go beyond the capabilities of Apple Home.
* SETUP CODES: Securely store your HomeKit and Matter codes in the app, so they are always at hand and never lost.
* MAINTENANCE: Keep track of your setup, quickly identifying which batteries need to be replaced, which devices are unreachable, or which automations are broken.
* LOGS: Monitor all activities and changes in your smart home.
* WIDGETS: Control your devices faster and easier with convenient widgets or quickly jump into your floor plan.

Unlock the full potential of your smart home with Controller for HomeKit. Download the app now and experience how simple and intuitive home automation can be.

For more information, visit our website: https://www.controllerforhomekit.com

cn.description:
Have you ever struggled to find confidence on stage or inspiration in the studio? AeroPads cues immersive pads and soundscapes that inspire and equip you to perform and write your best.

ENHANCE YOUR SOUND. ENGAGE YOUR AUDIENCE.
Every musician has experienced an empty mix or an awkward transition. When using AeroPads, you instantly add more dimension and character to your sound. With a more immersive mix and the ability to perform smooth and seamless transitions, you will feel more confident while your audience will be more engaged.

FOR EVERY MUSICIAN.
Pads and soundscapes are a versatile accompaniment to nearly any style of music. Whether you are a soloist or full band, AeroPads will take your sound to the next level. Rock bands, worship teams, wedding singers, producers, songwriters, and instrumentalists are just a few of the many types of musicians that have loved using AeroPads.

DESIGNED FOR THE STAGE. INSPIRED BY SPACE.
AeroPads features creative and immersive soundscapes paired with a beautiful and intuitive interface, all inspired by the pinnacle of exploration and inspiration: outer space.

CREATIVITY THAT SPARKS CREATIVITY.
AeroPads aren't your typical pads. Most pads out there are really boring or insanely obnoxious. However, AeroPads features thoughtfully crafted soundscapes that are meticulously fine-tuned with the perfect amount of harmonic and textural movement. Simply put, AeroPads won't step on the toes of your arrangement or get on the nerves of your sound guy (like most other pads out there).


Highlighted Features:
- A beautiful space-inspired interface with a simple and intuitive design.
- Live View: Every key and three of your favorite patches are instantly accessible (best suited for experimentation, free-flowing sets, and songwriting).
- Setlist View: Plan and build a detailed setlist (best suited for structured sets and seamless transitions).
- The iconic Atmosphere Soundpack which includes five unique patches named after and inspired by the layers of Earth's atmosphere. 
- Three patches can be added to Live View to be made instantly accessible, so there's no need to dig through menus to just to change a patch when performing live.
- Additional patches and Soundpacks available for purchase.
- Key-specific pads in multiple tonalities: major, minor, and neutral.
- Concert pitch adjustment.


How to Use:
01. Cue a pad that matches the key of your musical arrangement.
02. Play overtop of the accompanying pads and soundcapes.
03. Enjoy the boost of audience engagement, musician confidence, and creative inspiration.

Pads and soundscapes are intended as a subtle accompaniment to musical arrangements/performances. They are designed to be cued according to the key of the arrangement. Once cued, you'll hear a droning pad centered around the root note with additional harmonic textures within the selected key. The only time a pad's key should change within a song is in the instance of a key change. For best results, mix AeroPads appropriately within the overall mix. When mixed too loud, AeroPads may compete with melodies and the arrangement. When mixed too quietly, AeroPads may be less effective. When mixed appropriately, they will sound awesome.

本次更新：
1.优化了赛博护士的对话体验
cn.description:
想尝试医生护士的日常，却没时间读医学院？
这款应用让你随时随地体验医生护士的日常生活！
医疗模拟新体验，轻松解锁白大褂技能！

1. 【速诊挑战】
1. 面对真实病例，60秒内给出诊断
2. 越准越快，评级越高（S级大神就是你！）
3. 从菜鸟到专家，四级难度逐步挑战
4. 解锁医生职称，从实习医生晋升到主任医师
2. 【赛博护士】
1. 与难缠的患者实时对话，每次对话都是独特体验
2. 遇见各类"脾气"患者——焦虑的、生气的、怀疑的，用沟通技巧征服他们
3. 通过选择合适的回应，提升患者好感度，达95%即可通关
4. 患者情绪实时变化，你的每句话都在影响治疗结果
3. 【赛博医生】
1. 当一次赛博医生，对话诊断患者疾病；
2. 多样化病例库：每个难度对应不同疾病类型，从常见病到罕见疾病
3. 计时挑战：在有限时间内完成诊断，考验反应速度和专业判断

特色功能
1. 医学情景高度还原：基于真实医疗场景设计
2. 多样化患者反应：不再是固定剧本，每次对话都充满惊喜
3. 进度保存：随时暂停，随时继续你的医疗生涯
4. 无需专业知识：即使零医学背景也能轻松上手

用户真实评价
"下班后的解压神器！通关的成就感比打游戏还爽！" 
"原来哄病人开心这么有技巧，学到了!" 
"医学生表示很实用，临床实习前的热身工具" 
不需要医学背景，不需要专业知识，只要你对医疗世界有一点好奇心，这款应用就能带给你全新体验。
立即下载，今天就成为口袋里的神医！

Deco: Wallpaper Your Way. Stop searching, start creating. Download Deco and design the wallpaper only you can imagine.

Tired of boring backgrounds? Unleash your creativity with Deco and design stunning, unique wallpapers for your iPhone Lock Screen and Home Screen! Go way beyond the defaults and make your device truly yours.

Create Your Vibe:

Photos: Bring your memories to life! Use your own photos as backgrounds – Deco can even intelligently separate the subject* so your stickers tuck neatly behind (or in front of) it.
Gradients: Blend gorgeous, smooth color transitions with an easy-to-use editor and inspiring presets. Perfect for subtle or vibrant looks.
Stripes: Design chic and custom stripe patterns. You control the colors, angle, spacing, and background for endless possibilities. Presets help you get started fast.
Color: Sometimes simple is best. Pick the exact solid color that matches your mood or theme.
Image Playground: Feeling adventurous? Generate completely unique scenes using the magic of AI directly within Deco*.

Add Your Personal Touch:
Stickers: Layer on the fun! Add text, your favorite emoji, unique stickers (including Genmoji*). Place them anywhere you like – they'll look great even on different screen sizes!

Simple, Powerful, Yours:
Deco makes advanced customization easy and fun for everyone. It combines powerful features with a beautiful, intuitive interface. Deco won in the Swift Student Challenge 2025.

cn.description:
经典到不能再经典的小霸王红白机坦克, 小时候发梦也在玩. 在2012年我们为了延续儿时回忆, 开发了超级坦克大战, 很多人到现在也天天玩, 除了好玩外, 因为我们提供了500张地图. 天天玩, 玩了多年也还未玩完.

由于游戏引擎老化问题, 我们很难在超级坦克大战的基础上加入新功能. 所以我们决定开发新的坦克大战, "无尽坦克大战", 延续经典回忆.

作为经典的延续无尽坦克大战, 包含了所有经典元素, 改良了的新特点.
保证你可以玩到下一个十年.

游戏重点:
- 防御你的基地
- 摧毁所有敌方坦克
- 加入超级坦克大战500张传奇地图

无尽坦克大战, 是个跨平台游戏, 你可以在不同平台上找到它的踪影.
游戏会不定期更新, 目标是1000张地图.

hk.description:
2022年在日本熱賣的獨立遊戲終於支援了繁體中文！
獨創的戰鬥系統和生動的點陣圖動畫，加上以現代為舞台的硬派劇情，破關後還有更多深入要素的本格派RPG！
戰鬥能以直向單手操控的簡單操作，爽快卻又充滿了深奧的戰略性，同時還包含了育成、探索、隨機強化道具的收集等豐富遊玩要素！

・存檔數量：３（保存於裝置中）
・主要故事劇情破關時間約14小時～20小時左右
・遊戲破關後深入要素可以再玩50小時～100小時以上
・遊戲內沒有課金要素

【故事劇情】
這是一個能將靈魂等概念變換為資訊的現代世界。
但作為代價，異形在各地到處出現並威脅了人們的性命。
主角們所持有的靈魂驅動器能將靈魂轉化為資訊並對抗異形，
他們為了驅除街上的異形而來到了這個城市……

【系統介紹】
將裝備中的靈魂化為資訊，組合「靈魂碎片」(手牌)來進行戰鬥。
在戰鬥中組合靈魂碎片(手牌)即可連續發出不同的招式，並且和一般的牌組構築遊戲不同的是，最多可同時控制3個角色來構築更多樣化的戰略，加上生動的點陣圖展開的精采戰鬥。

■裝備和靈魂碎片
根據裝備不同，在戰鬥中能使用的靈魂碎片(手牌)也會改變。
裝備有主武器、副武器、裝甲、裝飾品等不同部位，根據組合來決定戰鬥中能使用的牌組。

■戰技
在戰鬥中，一開始的回合只能選擇1個靈魂碎片，
但只要達成各種條件，下回合能使用的靈魂碎片就會增加。例如攻擊敵人弱點、防禦、迴避、增益、減益等行動都能增加行動次數。
同時選擇不同靈魂碎片(手牌)，根據組合即可發動各種戰技(技能)。

hk.description:
Have you ever struggled to find confidence on stage or inspiration in the studio? AeroPads cues immersive pads and soundscapes that inspire and equip you to perform and write your best.

ENHANCE YOUR SOUND. ENGAGE YOUR AUDIENCE.
Every musician has experienced an empty mix or an awkward transition. When using AeroPads, you instantly add more dimension and character to your sound. With a more immersive mix and the ability to perform smooth and seamless transitions, you will feel more confident while your audience will be more engaged.

FOR EVERY MUSICIAN.
Pads and soundscapes are a versatile accompaniment to nearly any style of music. Whether you are a soloist or full band, AeroPads will take your sound to the next level. Rock bands, worship teams, wedding singers, producers, songwriters, and instrumentalists are just a few of the many types of musicians that have loved using AeroPads.

DESIGNED FOR THE STAGE. INSPIRED BY SPACE.
AeroPads features creative and immersive soundscapes paired with a beautiful and intuitive interface, all inspired by the pinnacle of exploration and inspiration: outer space.

CREATIVITY THAT SPARKS CREATIVITY.
AeroPads aren't your typical pads. Most pads out there are really boring or insanely obnoxious. However, AeroPads features thoughtfully crafted soundscapes that are meticulously fine-tuned with the perfect amount of harmonic and textural movement. Simply put, AeroPads won't step on the toes of your arrangement or get on the nerves of your sound guy (like most other pads out there).


Highlighted Features:
- A beautiful space-inspired interface with a simple and intuitive design.
- Live View: Every key and three of your favorite patches are instantly accessible (best suited for experimentation, free-flowing sets, and songwriting).
- Setlist View: Plan and build a detailed setlist (best suited for structured sets and seamless transitions).
- The iconic Atmosphere Soundpack which includes five unique patches named after and inspired by the layers of Earth's atmosphere. 
- Three patches can be added to Live View to be made instantly accessible, so there's no need to dig through menus to just to change a patch when performing live.
- Additional patches and Soundpacks available for purchase.
- Key-specific pads in multiple tonalities: major, minor, and neutral.
- Concert pitch adjustment.


How to Use:
01. Cue a pad that matches the key of your musical arrangement.
02. Play overtop of the accompanying pads and soundcapes.
03. Enjoy the boost of audience engagement, musician confidence, and creative inspiration.

Pads and soundscapes are intended as a subtle accompaniment to musical arrangements/performances. They are designed to be cued according to the key of the arrangement. Once cued, you'll hear a droning pad centered around the root note with additional harmonic textures within the selected key. The only time a pad's key should change within a song is in the instance of a key change. For best results, mix AeroPads appropriately within the overall mix. When mixed too loud, AeroPads may compete with melodies and the arrangement. When mixed too quietly, AeroPads may be less effective. When mixed appropriately, they will sound awesome.

hk.description:
SEIZE FORBIDDEN TREASURES. SUMMON ALIEN GODS. FEED ON YOUR DISCIPLES.

BE WARNED. This game has no tutorial - part of the challenge is figuring out how to play. It's hard, but keep trying, and you'll master it. Good luck!

In this infamous roguelike narrative card game, play as a seeker after unholy mysteries in a 1920s-themed setting of hidden gods and secret histories. Become a scholar of the unseen arts. Craft tools and summon spirits. Indoctrinate innocents. Seize your place as the herald of a new age.

Cultist Simulator was first released on PC and has more than 200,000 players all over the world. Now we’re bringing the cosmic mysteries of Cultist Simulator to mobile.

• Challenging roguelike gameplay - There is never only one history.
Cultist Simulator doesn’t hold your hand. Experiment, expire and transcend death with a story-driven legacy system. Over time you’ll learn enough to wrestle the game to its knees.

• Intense, immersive narrative – Combine cards to tell your own story.
A hefty novel’s worth of choice-based storytelling, from the creator of Fallen London and Sunless Sea. There are many paths through this game of ambition, appetite and abomination, and many ways your tale can end.

• A rich Lovecraftian world – Corrupt your friends and consume your enemies.
Search your dreams for sanity-twisting rituals. Translate grimoires and glean their lore. Penetrate the realm of the Hours and win a place in their service. Cultist Simulator brings the peripheral horror of Lovecraft’s tales to an entirely new setting.

Expand your knowledge with the DLCs: New Legacies, New Ascensions, New Mechanics...
• The Dancer - Join the Bacchanal
• The Priest - Knock, and Ye Shall Be Opened
• The Ghoul - Taste of the graveyard's fruit
• The Exile - Some there are who will not yield

If you encounter any issue with the game, please click on “Contact us” at the bottom of this page and give us as many details as possible regarding the issue and your device: https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/11-cultist-simulator/?p=ios

hk.description:
想尝试医生护士的日常，却没时间读医学院？
这款应用让你随时随地体验医生护士的日常生活！
医疗模拟新体验，轻松解锁白大褂技能！

1. 【速诊挑战】
1. 面对真实病例，60秒内给出诊断
2. 越准越快，评级越高（S级大神就是你！）
3. 从菜鸟到专家，四级难度逐步挑战
4. 解锁医生职称，从实习医生晋升到主任医师
2. 【赛博护士】
1. 与难缠的患者实时对话，每次对话都是独特体验
2. 遇见各类"脾气"患者——焦虑的、生气的、怀疑的，用沟通技巧征服他们
3. 通过选择合适的回应，提升患者好感度，达95%即可通关
4. 患者情绪实时变化，你的每句话都在影响治疗结果
3. 【赛博医生】
1. 当一次赛博医生，对话诊断患者疾病；
2. 多样化病例库：每个难度对应不同疾病类型，从常见病到罕见疾病
3. 计时挑战：在有限时间内完成诊断，考验反应速度和专业判断

特色功能
1. 医学情景高度还原：基于真实医疗场景设计
2. 多样化患者反应：不再是固定剧本，每次对话都充满惊喜
3. 进度保存：随时暂停，随时继续你的医疗生涯
4. 无需专业知识：即使零医学背景也能轻松上手

用户真实评价
"下班后的解压神器！通关的成就感比打游戏还爽！" 
"原来哄病人开心这么有技巧，学到了!" 
"医学生表示很实用，临床实习前的热身工具" 
不需要医学背景，不需要专业知识，只要你对医疗世界有一点好奇心，这款应用就能带给你全新体验。
立即下载，今天就成为口袋里的神医！

Deco: Wallpaper Your Way. Stop searching, start creating. Download Deco and design the wallpaper only you can imagine.

Tired of boring backgrounds? Unleash your creativity with Deco and design stunning, unique wallpapers for your iPhone Lock Screen and Home Screen! Go way beyond the defaults and make your device truly yours.

hk.description:
經典到不能再經典的紅白機坦克, 小時候發夢也在玩. 在2012年我們為了延續兒時回憶, 開發了超級坦克大戰, 很多人到現在也天天玩, 除了好玩外, 因為我們提供了500張地圖. 天天玩, 玩了多年也還未玩完.

由於遊戲引擎老化問題, 我們很難在超級坦克大戰的基礎上加入新功能. 所以我們決定開發新的坦克大戰, "無盡坦克大戰", 延續經典回憶. 

作為經典的延續無盡坦克大戰, 包含了所有經典元素, 改良了的新特點.
保證你可以玩到下一個十年.

遊戲重點:
- 防禦你的基地
- 摧毀所有敵方坦克
- 加入超級坦克大戰500張傳奇地圖

無盡坦克大戰, 是個跨平台遊戲, 你可以在不同平台上找到它的蹤影.
遊戲會不定期更新, 目標是1000張地圖.

hk.description:
《貪婪洞窟》全新英雄[猿神]悟空出世，獨特雙符文圖紙效果，掃平洞窟一切妖魔鬼怪。

【簡介】
《貪婪洞窟》是一款地牢探險Roguelike手游。遊戲整體畫風神秘而詭異，共有4種不同難度，400層隨機地形迷宮，60多種不同的怪物和BOSS，300多件隨機屬性的可收集裝備， 20000+字的線索式劇情。還有更多獨特有趣的玩法等你發現！

【遊戲背景】
在崇尚刀劍與魔法的彌爾頓大陸，一名冒險者在廢棄多年的礦坑中發現了大量的金子和財寶，一夜之間他收穫了從未想像的財富和名聲。
消息隨著北風迅速吹遍了整個大陸，各地的人蜂擁至此地卻又心懷鬼胎。
你，芸芸眾生中的一個普通年輕人，也帶著旁人看不透的目的，來到了這個地方……

【遊戲特色】
-探索隨機洞窟
你永遠不知道下一層洞窟會有什麼——寶藏、迷霧、陷阱、密室？還是強大首領？遊戲中充滿了不確定性，玩家只有依靠自己的計謀與膽量，才能以最小的犧牲換取最大的收穫。

-找尋捲軸 及時逃脫
逃脫捲軸是你離開洞窟唯一的物品，請務必盡快找到它！因為在洞窟內死亡後你將一無所獲——所有辛苦打怪升級的經驗、守財奴般積攢的金幣、讓你欣喜若狂的頂級寶物都將伴隨你的死亡埋葬。

-寶箱遍地也暗藏殺機
在洞窟中有許多奇珍異寶等你發現，密室寶藏更不能錯過。但是要小心那些看守寶藏的怪物，它們可是等著你上鉤呢！甚至還有偽裝成寶箱的怪物，讓你防不勝防！

-角色養成 裝備收集
在洞窟中消滅怪物能提升角色等級，合理分配屬性點與技能點將讓你更加從容面對洞窟的危險；升級、改造、附魔、點金你的裝備，以面對更具難度的探險，甚至挑戰邪惡首領，解開埋藏在洞窟的無盡秘密！

-寵物相伴 一起冒險
全新上線寵物系統，冒險之旅不再孤獨！在冒險的旅途中，你將會在不同的際遇下，遇上這些寵物。它們各具特色，也有專屬自己的獨特能力，帶上它們一起去冒險吧！

advisories: 偶爾/輕度的暴力卡通或幻想
mo.description:
這是遊戲創作者繼獲獎作品Kingdom Rush（王國保衛戰）三部曲之後的又一超凡太空奇幻歷險之作。即時，動態以及深度策略的遊戲模式將帶你穿越到不可思議的未知星球。沉浸式擬真遊戲場景，過癮的遊戲玩法，以及超凡絕佳的藝術感和一絲詼諧幽默感帶你進入激烈的戰爭世界。勇猛的士兵，威猛的機甲人和強大的外星人通通等你來統率，並肩迎接最強挑戰。

招募和訓練銀河系中最偉大的英雄，率領他們參與幾乎不可能完成的危險任務，發動他們強大的力量和能力。即使是在戰鬥最激烈的時候你也可通過改變自己部隊的角色而進行戰略調整，突擊隊員調整為狙擊兵，火焰噴射器調整為導彈發射器。通過炸彈襲擊，智能地雷，支援部隊，砲塔和各種特種武器轉變戰鬥態勢。

機器人軍隊整裝待發;星際戰艦墜毀了;到處是巨大怪物，未知的種族;所向披靡的攻擊;絕望的營救;無所畏懼地破壞行動正在銀河之中發生......銀河系需要你的統領。

銀河系需要鋼鐵戰隊

遊戲特色

指导你的部队参加3个不同世界的21次任务。準備好發動英勇的攻擊，堅守陣地，拯救平民，潛入超級計算機和各種英雄的物品。每個任務需要新的戰術和行動才能取得勝利。

通過17次終結式特別行動的戰術規則測試你的機智。每個關卡通過傷痕銘記挑戰。諒你也不敢。

解鎖不可能模式。僅對大無畏敢死隊開放。諒你絕對不敢。

在史詩戰鬥中擊敗巨大而非凡的頭目。這些頭目卑鄙而異常地巨大，他們決心要將你碾碎。鋼鐵戰隊，整裝待發！

40+升級以提升你的戰略，同時授予你的部隊防禦無人機，凝固汽油彈火箭，反彈爆炸和更多的器械可使用。

14位具有出色能力的英雄聽從你的調遣。將他們訓練到極致出色，否則惹惱他們後果自負。

8種可向敵人發動進攻的特種武器，讓你的戰術更加具有深度。還有什麼比得上一個瞄準了的導彈？對50枚高爆炸炸彈的軌道炮襲擊！

完成70+成就中的任何成就，贏得你應得的獎勵

選擇你的遊戲困難模式，找到屬於你的公平挑戰：休閒，普通或老兵別太狂妄了要么狂妄一點你自己決定！！

mo.description:
2022年在日本熱賣的獨立遊戲終於支援了繁體中文！
獨創的戰鬥系統和生動的點陣圖動畫，加上以現代為舞台的硬派劇情，破關後還有更多深入要素的本格派RPG！
戰鬥能以直向單手操控的簡單操作，爽快卻又充滿了深奧的戰略性，同時還包含了育成、探索、隨機強化道具的收集等豐富遊玩要素！

・存檔數量：３（保存於裝置中）
・主要故事劇情破關時間約14小時～20小時左右
・遊戲破關後深入要素可以再玩50小時～100小時以上
・遊戲內沒有課金要素

【故事劇情】
這是一個能將靈魂等概念變換為資訊的現代世界。
但作為代價，異形在各地到處出現並威脅了人們的性命。
主角們所持有的靈魂驅動器能將靈魂轉化為資訊並對抗異形，
他們為了驅除街上的異形而來到了這個城市……

【系統介紹】
將裝備中的靈魂化為資訊，組合「靈魂碎片」(手牌)來進行戰鬥。
在戰鬥中組合靈魂碎片(手牌)即可連續發出不同的招式，並且和一般的牌組構築遊戲不同的是，最多可同時控制3個角色來構築更多樣化的戰略，加上生動的點陣圖展開的精采戰鬥。

■裝備和靈魂碎片
根據裝備不同，在戰鬥中能使用的靈魂碎片(手牌)也會改變。
裝備有主武器、副武器、裝甲、裝飾品等不同部位，根據組合來決定戰鬥中能使用的牌組。

■戰技
在戰鬥中，一開始的回合只能選擇1個靈魂碎片，
但只要達成各種條件，下回合能使用的靈魂碎片就會增加。例如攻擊敵人弱點、防禦、迴避、增益、減益等行動都能增加行動次數。
同時選擇不同靈魂碎片(手牌)，根據組合即可發動各種戰技(技能)。

mo.description:
THE ORIGINAL HASBRO BOARD GAME - It’s the classic murder mystery! Who did it? With what weapon? In which room? There’s a high-risk party at the mansion and every guest is a suspect. Roll the dice, become a detective and let Cluedo begin!

•        A PREMIUM DIGITAL BOARD GAME - There are no ads, no pop-ups and no pay-to-win limits. Once you buy the app, that’s it: unlimited multiplayer fun for you and your family and nothing to stop you solving the crime!

•        A BRAIN TEASER - Test your detective skills. At the start of each game, Cluedo will take one suspect, one weapon, and one room from the deck, and deal the rest to the players. If you ask: “was it Colonel Mustard with the Rope in the Drawing Room”, a player holding the Colonel, the Rope or the Drawing Room must show you their card. Enter every room in search of answers!

•        CLUESHEET & HINT SYSTEM - Who committed murder?! Don’t risk letting the criminal escape! Use your virtual cluesheet companion to make a note of the suspects, weapons and rooms you can eliminate. The ideal companion for every detective: cluesheet helps you make your deductions, perfect your strategy and solve the mystery.

•        FAMILY FRIENDLY - It’s the original family board game by Hasbro, suitable for all players 8 years and over. With no adverts or necessary in-app purchases it’s multiplayer fun for kids and adults. With the whole board game on your mobile you can take Cluedo wherever you go! Roll the dice and solve the mystery!

•        SINGLE PLAYER - Put your brain to the test against a guest list of AI murder suspects, online or offline! Choose your character, choose your opponents and let no criminal escape the mansion!

•        ONLINE MULTIPLAYER - Play Cluedo with your friends and find out who’s guilty on mobile, PC or Nintendo Switch! Don’t let distance stop your board game night. Play on the go, or curl up in an armchair and settle down for a night of crime and detective work, wherever you are!

•        10 ADDITIONAL THEMES - Explore ten different themed boards with Cluedo's Ultimate Detective’s Package. Listed under “Editor’s Choice” for the Most Stylish Game, our exclusive original themes are hand crafted by our studio artists. 
o        Tudor Mansion: The guests at this party have turned out to be a lethal combination!
o        Vampire Castle: In a household where every suspect is a monster, who committed the crime?
o        Egyptian Adventure: Solve the crime, from the dark tombs of pharaohs to the crumbling pyramids!
o        Hollywood: In a land where life is an act, can you find the truth in the fairytale?
o        Murder Express: Challenge your friends to solve a mystery based on a classic Agatha Christie novel!
o        Sherlock: Become the great detective and solve a crime on the dark streets of London!
o        Snowy Peaks: Old friends have been reunited. Tensions are running high, but whose grudge ran that deep?
o        Tropical Mystery: Someone has rocked this boat in a big way! It’s a luxury race to the answer!
o        Venetian Masquerade: Historic Venice is beautiful, but crime lurks beneath the surface!
o        Wild West: From the jailhouse to the saloon, the story of Dr. Black’s end will spread far and wide. Only you can discover the truth!


About Marmalade Game Studio
At Marmalade Game Studio we make quality, premium multiplayer board games. Play our classic games, including Monopoly and The Game of Life 2, anywhere on your mobile! Enjoy with your friends and family whether you’re together or apart. You can find the fun with people you know or players around the world. Our games are ad-free, family friendly fun. For quality time, look for the Marmalade Game Studio logo.

mo.description:
Have you ever struggled to find confidence on stage or inspiration in the studio? AeroPads cues immersive pads and soundscapes that inspire and equip you to perform and write your best.

ENHANCE YOUR SOUND. ENGAGE YOUR AUDIENCE.
Every musician has experienced an empty mix or an awkward transition. When using AeroPads, you instantly add more dimension and character to your sound. With a more immersive mix and the ability to perform smooth and seamless transitions, you will feel more confident while your audience will be more engaged.

FOR EVERY MUSICIAN.
Pads and soundscapes are a versatile accompaniment to nearly any style of music. Whether you are a soloist or full band, AeroPads will take your sound to the next level. Rock bands, worship teams, wedding singers, producers, songwriters, and instrumentalists are just a few of the many types of musicians that have loved using AeroPads.

DESIGNED FOR THE STAGE. INSPIRED BY SPACE.
AeroPads features creative and immersive soundscapes paired with a beautiful and intuitive interface, all inspired by the pinnacle of exploration and inspiration: outer space.

CREATIVITY THAT SPARKS CREATIVITY.
AeroPads aren't your typical pads. Most pads out there are really boring or insanely obnoxious. However, AeroPads features thoughtfully crafted soundscapes that are meticulously fine-tuned with the perfect amount of harmonic and textural movement. Simply put, AeroPads won't step on the toes of your arrangement or get on the nerves of your sound guy (like most other pads out there).


Highlighted Features:
- A beautiful space-inspired interface with a simple and intuitive design.
- Live View: Every key and three of your favorite patches are instantly accessible (best suited for experimentation, free-flowing sets, and songwriting).
- Setlist View: Plan and build a detailed setlist (best suited for structured sets and seamless transitions).
- The iconic Atmosphere Soundpack which includes five unique patches named after and inspired by the layers of Earth's atmosphere. 
- Three patches can be added to Live View to be made instantly accessible, so there's no need to dig through menus to just to change a patch when performing live.
- Additional patches and Soundpacks available for purchase.
- Key-specific pads in multiple tonalities: major, minor, and neutral.
- Concert pitch adjustment.


How to Use:
01. Cue a pad that matches the key of your musical arrangement.
02. Play overtop of the accompanying pads and soundcapes.
03. Enjoy the boost of audience engagement, musician confidence, and creative inspiration.

Pads and soundscapes are intended as a subtle accompaniment to musical arrangements/performances. They are designed to be cued according to the key of the arrangement. Once cued, you'll hear a droning pad centered around the root note with additional harmonic textures within the selected key. The only time a pad's key should change within a song is in the instance of a key change. For best results, mix AeroPads appropriately within the overall mix. When mixed too loud, AeroPads may compete with melodies and the arrangement. When mixed too quietly, AeroPads may be less effective. When mixed appropriately, they will sound awesome.

mo.description:
SEIZE FORBIDDEN TREASURES. SUMMON ALIEN GODS. FEED ON YOUR DISCIPLES.

BE WARNED. This game has no tutorial - part of the challenge is figuring out how to play. It's hard, but keep trying, and you'll master it. Good luck!

In this infamous roguelike narrative card game, play as a seeker after unholy mysteries in a 1920s-themed setting of hidden gods and secret histories. Become a scholar of the unseen arts. Craft tools and summon spirits. Indoctrinate innocents. Seize your place as the herald of a new age.

Cultist Simulator was first released on PC and has more than 200,000 players all over the world. Now we’re bringing the cosmic mysteries of Cultist Simulator to mobile.

• Challenging roguelike gameplay - There is never only one history.
Cultist Simulator doesn’t hold your hand. Experiment, expire and transcend death with a story-driven legacy system. Over time you’ll learn enough to wrestle the game to its knees.

• Intense, immersive narrative – Combine cards to tell your own story.
A hefty novel’s worth of choice-based storytelling, from the creator of Fallen London and Sunless Sea. There are many paths through this game of ambition, appetite and abomination, and many ways your tale can end.

• A rich Lovecraftian world – Corrupt your friends and consume your enemies.
Search your dreams for sanity-twisting rituals. Translate grimoires and glean their lore. Penetrate the realm of the Hours and win a place in their service. Cultist Simulator brings the peripheral horror of Lovecraft’s tales to an entirely new setting.

Expand your knowledge with the DLCs: New Legacies, New Ascensions, New Mechanics...
• The Dancer - Join the Bacchanal
• The Priest - Knock, and Ye Shall Be Opened
• The Ghoul - Taste of the graveyard's fruit
• The Exile - Some there are who will not yield

If you encounter any issue with the game, please click on “Contact us” at the bottom of this page and give us as many details as possible regarding the issue and your device: https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/11-cultist-simulator/?p=ios

mo.trackName: 赛博神医-猜病每日挑战小测验
mo.description:
想尝试医生护士的日常，却没时间读医学院？
这款应用让你随时随地体验医生护士的日常生活！
医疗模拟新体验，轻松解锁白大褂技能！

1. 【速诊挑战】
1. 面对真实病例，60秒内给出诊断
2. 越准越快，评级越高（S级大神就是你！）
3. 从菜鸟到专家，四级难度逐步挑战
4. 解锁医生职称，从实习医生晋升到主任医师
2. 【赛博护士】
1. 与难缠的患者实时对话，每次对话都是独特体验
2. 遇见各类"脾气"患者——焦虑的、生气的、怀疑的，用沟通技巧征服他们
3. 通过选择合适的回应，提升患者好感度，达95%即可通关
4. 患者情绪实时变化，你的每句话都在影响治疗结果
3. 【赛博医生】
1. 当一次赛博医生，对话诊断患者疾病；
2. 多样化病例库：每个难度对应不同疾病类型，从常见病到罕见疾病
3. 计时挑战：在有限时间内完成诊断，考验反应速度和专业判断

特色功能
1. 医学情景高度还原：基于真实医疗场景设计
2. 多样化患者反应：不再是固定剧本，每次对话都充满惊喜
3. 进度保存：随时暂停，随时继续你的医疗生涯
4. 无需专业知识：即使零医学背景也能轻松上手

用户真实评价
"下班后的解压神器！通关的成就感比打游戏还爽！" 
"原来哄病人开心这么有技巧，学到了!" 
"医学生表示很实用，临床实习前的热身工具" 
不需要医学背景，不需要专业知识，只要你对医疗世界有一点好奇心，这款应用就能带给你全新体验。
立即下载，今天就成为口袋里的神医！

mo.description:
Deco: Wallpaper Your Way. Stop searching, start creating. Download Deco and design the wallpaper only you can imagine.

Tired of boring backgrounds? Unleash your creativity with Deco and design stunning, unique wallpapers for your iPhone Lock Screen and Home Screen! Go way beyond the defaults and make your device truly yours.

Create Your Vibe:

Photos: Bring your memories to life! Use your own photos as backgrounds – Deco can even intelligently separate the subject* so your stickers tuck neatly behind (or in front of) it.
Gradients: Blend gorgeous, smooth color transitions with an easy-to-use editor and inspiring presets. Perfect for subtle or vibrant looks.
Stripes: Design chic and custom stripe patterns. You control the colors, angle, spacing, and background for endless possibilities. Presets help you get started fast.
Color: Sometimes simple is best. Pick the exact solid color that matches your mood or theme.

mo.description:
經典到不能再經典的紅白機坦克, 小時候發夢也在玩. 在2012年我們為了延續兒時回憶, 開發了超級坦克大戰, 很多人到現在也天天玩, 除了好玩外, 因為我們提供了500張地圖. 天天玩, 玩了多年也還未玩完.

由於遊戲引擎老化問題, 我們很難在超級坦克大戰的基礎上加入新功能. 所以我們決定開發新的坦克大戰, "無盡坦克大戰", 延續經典回憶. 

作為經典的延續無盡坦克大戰, 包含了所有經典元素, 改良了的新特點.
保證你可以玩到下一個十年.

- 防禦你的基地

遊戲會不定期更新, 目標是1000張地圖.

tw.description:
2022年在日本熱賣的獨立遊戲終於支援了繁體中文！
獨創的戰鬥系統和生動的點陣圖動畫，加上以現代為舞台的硬派劇情，破關後還有更多深入要素的本格派RPG！
戰鬥能以直向單手操控的簡單操作，爽快卻又充滿了深奧的戰略性，同時還包含了育成、探索、隨機強化道具的收集等豐富遊玩要素！

・存檔數量：３（保存於裝置中）
・主要故事劇情破關時間約14小時～20小時左右
・遊戲破關後深入要素可以再玩50小時～100小時以上
・遊戲內沒有課金要素

【故事劇情】
這是一個能將靈魂等概念變換為資訊的現代世界。
但作為代價，異形在各地到處出現並威脅了人們的性命。
主角們所持有的靈魂驅動器能將靈魂轉化為資訊並對抗異形，
他們為了驅除街上的異形而來到了這個城市……

【系統介紹】
將裝備中的靈魂化為資訊，組合「靈魂碎片」(手牌)來進行戰鬥。
在戰鬥中組合靈魂碎片(手牌)即可連續發出不同的招式，並且和一般的牌組構築遊戲不同的是，最多可同時控制3個角色來構築更多樣化的戰略，加上生動的點陣圖展開的精采戰鬥。

■裝備和靈魂碎片
根據裝備不同，在戰鬥中能使用的靈魂碎片(手牌)也會改變。
裝備有主武器、副武器、裝甲、裝飾品等不同部位，根據組合來決定戰鬥中能使用的牌組。

■戰技
在戰鬥中，一開始的回合只能選擇1個靈魂碎片，
但只要達成各種條件，下回合能使用的靈魂碎片就會增加。例如攻擊敵人弱點、防禦、迴避、增益、減益等行動都能增加行動次數。
同時選擇不同靈魂碎片(手牌)，根據組合即可發動各種戰技(技能)。

tw.description:
這是遊戲創作者繼獲獎作品Kingdom Rush（王國保衛戰）三部曲之後的又一超凡太空奇幻歷險之作。即時，動態以及深度策略的遊戲模式將帶你穿越到不可思議的未知星球。沉浸式擬真遊戲場景，過癮的遊戲玩法，以及超凡絕佳的藝術感和一絲詼諧幽默感帶你進入激烈的戰爭世界。勇猛的士兵，威猛的機甲人和強大的外星人通通等你來統率，並肩迎接最強挑戰。

招募和訓練銀河系中最偉大的英雄，率領他們參與幾乎不可能完成的危險任務，發動他們強大的力量和能力。即使是在戰鬥最激烈的時候你也可通過改變自己部隊的角色而進行戰略調整，突擊隊員調整為狙擊兵，火焰噴射器調整為導彈發射器。通過炸彈襲擊，智能地雷，支援部隊，砲塔和各種特種武器轉變戰鬥態勢。

機器人軍隊整裝待發;星際戰艦墜毀了;到處是巨大怪物，未知的種族;所向披靡的攻擊;絕望的營救;無所畏懼地破壞行動正在銀河之中發生......銀河系需要你的統領。

銀河系需要鋼鐵戰隊

遊戲特色

指导你的部队参加3个不同世界的21次任务。準備好發動英勇的攻擊，堅守陣地，拯救平民，潛入超級計算機和各種英雄的物品。每個任務需要新的戰術和行動才能取得勝利。

通過17次終結式特別行動的戰術規則測試你的機智。每個關卡通過傷痕銘記挑戰。諒你也不敢。

解鎖不可能模式。僅對大無畏敢死隊開放。諒你絕對不敢。

在史詩戰鬥中擊敗巨大而非凡的頭目。這些頭目卑鄙而異常地巨大，他們決心要將你碾碎。鋼鐵戰隊，整裝待發！

40+升級以提升你的戰略，同時授予你的部隊防禦無人機，凝固汽油彈火箭，反彈爆炸和更多的器械可使用。

14位具有出色能力的英雄聽從你的調遣。將他們訓練到極致出色，否則惹惱他們後果自負。

8種可向敵人發動進攻的特種武器，讓你的戰術更加具有深度。還有什麼比得上一個瞄準了的導彈？對50枚高爆炸炸彈的軌道炮襲擊！

完成70+成就中的任何成就，贏得你應得的獎勵

選擇你的遊戲困難模式，找到屬於你的公平挑戰：休閒，普通或老兵別太狂妄了要么狂妄一點你自己決定！！

tw.description:
Have you ever struggled to find confidence on stage or inspiration in the studio? AeroPads cues immersive pads and soundscapes that inspire and equip you to perform and write your best.

ENHANCE YOUR SOUND. ENGAGE YOUR AUDIENCE.
Every musician has experienced an empty mix or an awkward transition. When using AeroPads, you instantly add more dimension and character to your sound. With a more immersive mix and the ability to perform smooth and seamless transitions, you will feel more confident while your audience will be more engaged.

FOR EVERY MUSICIAN.
Pads and soundscapes are a versatile accompaniment to nearly any style of music. Whether you are a soloist or full band, AeroPads will take your sound to the next level. Rock bands, worship teams, wedding singers, producers, songwriters, and instrumentalists are just a few of the many types of musicians that have loved using AeroPads.

DESIGNED FOR THE STAGE. INSPIRED BY SPACE.
AeroPads features creative and immersive soundscapes paired with a beautiful and intuitive interface, all inspired by the pinnacle of exploration and inspiration: outer space.

CREATIVITY THAT SPARKS CREATIVITY.
AeroPads aren't your typical pads. Most pads out there are really boring or insanely obnoxious. However, AeroPads features thoughtfully crafted soundscapes that are meticulously fine-tuned with the perfect amount of harmonic and textural movement. Simply put, AeroPads won't step on the toes of your arrangement or get on the nerves of your sound guy (like most other pads out there).


Highlighted Features:
- A beautiful space-inspired interface with a simple and intuitive design.
- Live View: Every key and three of your favorite patches are instantly accessible (best suited for experimentation, free-flowing sets, and songwriting).
- Setlist View: Plan and build a detailed setlist (best suited for structured sets and seamless transitions).
- The iconic Atmosphere Soundpack which includes five unique patches named after and inspired by the layers of Earth's atmosphere. 
- Three patches can be added to Live View to be made instantly accessible, so there's no need to dig through menus to just to change a patch when performing live.
- Additional patches and Soundpacks available for purchase.
- Key-specific pads in multiple tonalities: major, minor, and neutral.
- Concert pitch adjustment.


How to Use:
01. Cue a pad that matches the key of your musical arrangement.
02. Play overtop of the accompanying pads and soundcapes.
03. Enjoy the boost of audience engagement, musician confidence, and creative inspiration.

Pads and soundscapes are intended as a subtle accompaniment to musical arrangements/performances. They are designed to be cued according to the key of the arrangement. Once cued, you'll hear a droning pad centered around the root note with additional harmonic textures within the selected key. The only time a pad's key should change within a song is in the instance of a key change. For best results, mix AeroPads appropriately within the overall mix. When mixed too loud, AeroPads may compete with melodies and the arrangement. When mixed too quietly, AeroPads may be less effective. When mixed appropriately, they will sound awesome.

tw.description:
SEIZE FORBIDDEN TREASURES. SUMMON ALIEN GODS. FEED ON YOUR DISCIPLES.

BE WARNED. This game has no tutorial - part of the challenge is figuring out how to play. It's hard, but keep trying, and you'll master it. Good luck!

In this infamous roguelike narrative card game, play as a seeker after unholy mysteries in a 1920s-themed setting of hidden gods and secret histories. Become a scholar of the unseen arts. Craft tools and summon spirits. Indoctrinate innocents. Seize your place as the herald of a new age.

Cultist Simulator was first released on PC and has more than 200,000 players all over the world. Now we’re bringing the cosmic mysteries of Cultist Simulator to mobile.

• Challenging roguelike gameplay - There is never only one history.
Cultist Simulator doesn’t hold your hand. Experiment, expire and transcend death with a story-driven legacy system. Over time you’ll learn enough to wrestle the game to its knees.

• Intense, immersive narrative – Combine cards to tell your own story.
A hefty novel’s worth of choice-based storytelling, from the creator of Fallen London and Sunless Sea. There are many paths through this game of ambition, appetite and abomination, and many ways your tale can end.

• A rich Lovecraftian world – Corrupt your friends and consume your enemies.
Search your dreams for sanity-twisting rituals. Translate grimoires and glean their lore. Penetrate the realm of the Hours and win a place in their service. Cultist Simulator brings the peripheral horror of Lovecraft’s tales to an entirely new setting.

Expand your knowledge with the DLCs: New Legacies, New Ascensions, New Mechanics...
• The Dancer - Join the Bacchanal
• The Priest - Knock, and Ye Shall Be Opened
• The Ghoul - Taste of the graveyard's fruit
• The Exile - Some there are who will not yield

If you encounter any issue with the game, please click on “Contact us” at the bottom of this page and give us as many details as possible regarding the issue and your device: https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/11-cultist-simulator/?p=ios

Deco: Wallpaper Your Way. Stop searching, start creating. Download Deco and design the wallpaper only you can imagine.

A world line in which even the fictitious concept of the soul can be converted into data.

Strategy (deck) is determined.

The combination of soul bits (cards in hand) selected at the same time activates a skill called Arts.

us.description:
SEIZE FORBIDDEN TREASURES. SUMMON ALIEN GODS. FEED ON YOUR DISCIPLES.

BE WARNED. This game has no tutorial - part of the challenge is figuring out how to play. It's hard, but keep trying, and you'll master it. Good luck!

In this infamous roguelike narrative card game, play as a seeker after unholy mysteries in a 1920s-themed setting of hidden gods and secret histories. Become a scholar of the unseen arts. Craft tools and summon spirits. Indoctrinate innocents. Seize your place as the herald of a new age.

Cultist Simulator was first released on PC and has more than 200,000 players all over the world. Now we’re bringing the cosmic mysteries of Cultist Simulator to mobile.

• Challenging roguelike gameplay - There is never only one history.
Cultist Simulator doesn’t hold your hand. Experiment, expire and transcend death with a story-driven legacy system. Over time you’ll learn enough to wrestle the game to its knees.

• Intense, immersive narrative – Combine cards to tell your own story.
A hefty novel’s worth of choice-based storytelling, from the creator of Fallen London and Sunless Sea. There are many paths through this game of ambition, appetite and abomination, and many ways your tale can end.

• A rich Lovecraftian world – Corrupt your friends and consume your enemies.
Search your dreams for sanity-twisting rituals. Translate grimoires and glean their lore. Penetrate the realm of the Hours and win a place in their service. Cultist Simulator brings the peripheral horror of Lovecraft’s tales to an entirely new setting.

Expand your knowledge with the DLCs: New Legacies, New Ascensions, New Mechanics...
• The Dancer - Join the Bacchanal
• The Priest - Knock, and Ye Shall Be Opened
• The Ghoul - Taste of the graveyard's fruit
• The Exile - Some there are who will not yield

If you encounter any issue with the game, please click on “Contact us” at the bottom of this page and give us as many details as possible regarding the issue and your device: https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/11-cultist-simulator/?p=ios

us.releaseNotes: Play The Game of Life 2 face-to-face with your friends wherever you are, with in-game video chat! Spin the spinner and share the fun and laughter every step of the way!
us.description:
Live 1000 lives in the official sequel to the classic family board game, The Game of Life! Will you be a Video Blogger or an Astronomer? Play now!

Voted "Best Digital Board Game” in the Pocket Gamer Awards 2021
Played by over 50 Million Families Worldwide

Customise your peg, hop in your eco car and race your friends and family through The Game of Life 2! It’s a contemporary sequel to the classic family favourite board game, The Game of Life. With an added crossroad moment and new ways to win, what will you choose? Earn points for Knowledge and Happiness as well as Wealth. Go to College, or don’t. Get married early, save it for later, or stay single! Have kids, adopt pets, do both or neither. The choices are all yours, and every decision counts!

Features

The Game of Life 2 digital board game is the award-winning sequel to the original Hasbro board game, The Game of Life.
• A GAME FOR UP 4 PLAYERS - Join 3 of your favourite people and live your dreams
• *NEW*  VIDEO CHAT AND PLAY - Live every life face-to-face with in-game video chat
• AN AD-FREE GAME - Enjoy the complete game with no interruptions
• 6 TRANSLATIONS - English, French, Spanish, German, Italian and Brazilian Portuguese
• SINGLE PLAYER - Take on our challenging AI
• ONLINE MULTIPLAYER - Connect with fans, or invite friends and family to a private game
• PASS & PLAY - No internet? No problem! Pass a single device between players for a wifi-free experience

How to play

CUSTOMISE your character
Customise your pink, blue or newly available purple peg with a style all of your own.

SPIN THE SPINNER
The game starts with a big decision. Will you go to College or straight into work? In this classic simulation, what will your friends and family choose?

It’s your LIFE PATH
Get married or don’t, have kids, adopt pets, or both! Work as a Pet Groomer, then qualify and become a Wind Turbine Technician! The choices are yours!

More WAYS TO WIN
Earn points for every choice you make! Every choice increases your wealth, happiness or knowledge, so every decision is valid.

RETIRE your way
Continue living the life of your dreams! Relax in a luxury home, or hit the road and fulfil your bucket list! Unlike the classic board game, you can choose to venture on!

Earn REWARDS to UNLOCK new items
Unlock new pegs, outfits and vehicles by playing the game and earning rewards!

In-game Video Chat
Recreate the magic! Gather around the board with in-game video chat in Online Multiplayer Mode. It’s super easy to set-up and play:

• Create your free private account
• Invite your friends and family to chat groups
• Start games straight from those chats
• Play face-to-face wherever you are

It’s simple, seamless fun for everyone.

The Ultimate Life Collection
Venture into a collection of 10 amazing fantasy worlds. Live life in enchanted worlds, make friends with dinosaurs in the Age of Giants and launch into the futuristic Lunar Age! Every new world features new Outfits, Vehicles, Jobs, Properties and more!

us.description:
Have you ever struggled to find confidence on stage or inspiration in the studio? AeroPads cues immersive pads and soundscapes that inspire and equip you to perform and write your best.

ENHANCE YOUR SOUND. ENGAGE YOUR AUDIENCE.
Every musician has experienced an empty mix or an awkward transition. When using AeroPads, you instantly add more dimension and character to your sound. With a more immersive mix and the ability to perform smooth and seamless transitions, you will feel more confident while your audience will be more engaged.

FOR EVERY MUSICIAN.
Pads and soundscapes are a versatile accompaniment to nearly any style of music. Whether you are a soloist or full band, AeroPads will take your sound to the next level. Rock bands, worship teams, wedding singers, producers, songwriters, and instrumentalists are just a few of the many types of musicians that have loved using AeroPads.

DESIGNED FOR THE STAGE. INSPIRED BY SPACE.
AeroPads features creative and immersive soundscapes paired with a beautiful and intuitive interface, all inspired by the pinnacle of exploration and inspiration: outer space.

CREATIVITY THAT SPARKS CREATIVITY.
AeroPads aren't your typical pads. Most pads out there are really boring or insanely obnoxious. However, AeroPads features thoughtfully crafted soundscapes that are meticulously fine-tuned with the perfect amount of harmonic and textural movement. Simply put, AeroPads won't step on the toes of your arrangement or get on the nerves of your sound guy (like most other pads out there).


Highlighted Features:
- A beautiful space-inspired interface with a simple and intuitive design.
- Live View: Every key and three of your favorite patches are instantly accessible (best suited for experimentation, free-flowing sets, and songwriting).
- Setlist View: Plan and build a detailed setlist (best suited for structured sets and seamless transitions).
- The iconic Atmosphere Soundpack which includes five unique patches named after and inspired by the layers of Earth's atmosphere. 
- Three patches can be added to Live View to be made instantly accessible, so there's no need to dig through menus to just to change a patch when performing live.
- Additional patches and Soundpacks available for purchase.
- Key-specific pads in multiple tonalities: major, minor, and neutral.
- Concert pitch adjustment.


How to Use:
01. Cue a pad that matches the key of your musical arrangement.
02. Play overtop of the accompanying pads and soundcapes.
03. Enjoy the boost of audience engagement, musician confidence, and creative inspiration.

Pads and soundscapes are intended as a subtle accompaniment to musical arrangements/performances. They are designed to be cued according to the key of the arrangement. Once cued, you'll hear a droning pad centered around the root note with additional harmonic textures within the selected key. The only time a pad's key should change within a song is in the instance of a key change. For best results, mix AeroPads appropriately within the overall mix. When mixed too loud, AeroPads may compete with melodies and the arrangement. When mixed too quietly, AeroPads may be less effective. When mixed appropriately, they will sound awesome.

us.description:
想尝试医生护士的日常，却没时间读医学院？
这款应用让你随时随地体验医生护士的日常生活！
医疗模拟新体验，轻松解锁白大褂技能！

1. 【速诊挑战】
1. 面对真实病例，60秒内给出诊断
2. 越准越快，评级越高（S级大神就是你！）
3. 从菜鸟到专家，四级难度逐步挑战
4. 解锁医生职称，从实习医生晋升到主任医师
2. 【赛博护士】
1. 与难缠的患者实时对话，每次对话都是独特体验
2. 遇见各类"脾气"患者——焦虑的、生气的、怀疑的，用沟通技巧征服他们
3. 通过选择合适的回应，提升患者好感度，达95%即可通关
4. 患者情绪实时变化，你的每句话都在影响治疗结果
3. 【赛博医生】
1. 当一次赛博医生，对话诊断患者疾病；
2. 多样化病例库：每个难度对应不同疾病类型，从常见病到罕见疾病
3. 计时挑战：在有限时间内完成诊断，考验反应速度和专业判断

特色功能
1. 医学情景高度还原：基于真实医疗场景设计
2. 多样化患者反应：不再是固定剧本，每次对话都充满惊喜

用户真实评价
"下班后的解压神器！通关的成就感比打游戏还爽！" 
"原来哄病人开心这么有技巧，学到了!"

不需要医学背景，不需要专业知识，只要你对医疗世界有一点好奇心，这款应用就能带给你全新体验。
立即下载，今天就成为口袋里的神医！

Can you stop the Insurgency? From the creator of Plague Inc. comes a unique and deeply engaging political/military strategic simulation. 

The war is ‘over’ - but we all know that doesn’t mean anything. To stabilise the country, you need to balance military and civilian priorities to win the hearts and minds of the people, whilst also stopping insurgents from seizing power!

Rebel Inc. is the brand new game from the creator of ‘Plague Inc.’ - one of the most popular paid games ever with over 130 million players. Brilliantly executed with beautiful graphics and critically acclaimed gameplay - Rebel Inc. offers a deeply engaging, strategic challenge inspired by the complexities and consequences of modern counter insurgency.

tr.description:
Deck-Building JRPG "SOULVARS" is now available!

15-20 hours of playtime (+50h to go deeper)
Dynamic pixel animation and battles and a rich customization system

No In-App Purchases. 

While having a deep strategic sense, the vertically held smartphone controls allow for simple and exhilarating battles, training, dungeon exploration, and collection of random enchanted items.

▼ Story
A world line in which even the fictitious concept of the soul can be converted into data.
In return, people's lives are threatened by the sudden appearance of deformities.
The protagonists use the Soul Driver, a device that converts souls into data.
They are responsible for the elimination of the deformities that threaten people, and work in a certain town...

▼System Overview
Number of save slots: 3 (Saved in device and manual save)
Estimated scenario completion time: 14 to 20 hours
50 to 100+ hours of post-clearance challenge

Features
Soul bits (handbills), which are the data of the soul power that resides in gear (equipment),
Players can combine them in battle to make special attacks and combos in a successive manner. 
The characters are characterized by their action with dots that move around.

▼Gear and Soul Bits
Soul bits (hand cards) can be drawn from gear (equipment) and used as actions during battle.
The combination of main weapon, subweapon, armor, and accessories
Strategy (deck) is determined.

▼Arts
During a battle, only one soul bit can be selected on the first turn, but
The number of soul bits that can be selected at one time increases depending on the opponent's weaknesses, guarding, evading, buffing, debuffing, and various other conditions.
The combination of soul bits (cards in hand) selected at the same time activates a skill called Arts.

tr.description:
Survive in post-nuclear USSR: defeat diseases, hunger and enemies! Play Online also! Survive with other players together.

Benefits of Premium version:
- Unique pet Raven
- Starter Kit
- Caches of useful items in shelters
- Expanded selection of perks
- Chat without any limitations
- Reduced waiting time between parcels
- Access to all kinds and colors of map markers

Can you survive in the world destroyed after a nuclear war? With radiation, hunger and diseases around you. You have to cross the whole country and save your family. Who knows if they are alive, or maybe radiation and deadly virus have already reached them? Reveal a secret of the apocalypse and get your memories back during a journey across the huge territory of the USSR in the 80th. 

It is not easy to survive after apocalypse. You'll face the real hungry games! Monsters, zombie, thirst, uncountable diseases and injuries, blood-thirsty enemies – you have to fight it all. Craft all your resources: weapons, clothes, means of transport. 

- Hardcore survival:
Hunger, zombie and radiation won't give you a chance to relax.

- Realistic world:
The turn of the seasons, huge map of USSR and more than 2500 different towns and cities. Hunt animals, but be careful: even rats can injure you seriously! Explore the wilderness!

- A lot of opportunities:
Multicraft, obtaining skills, hundreds of crafting schemes, a lot of ammunition.

- People and stories:
Interesting quests and helpful allies. An open game world.

- Improve your skills:
Mechanics, medicine, chemistry and many others.

- Cooperative mode:
The Online mode  with a chat room, exchange of items and united fightings. Multiplayer survival game.

Explore the abandoned houses and shelters. Find weapon and build transport using various materials.
Remember everything you learnt on chemistry and physics! It is the most realistic surviving game! 

Features: 
- Сraft system – get resources, hunt, find useful objects or weapon and create your own one! 
- Hardcore simulator of survival 
- Journey across the wilderness map in the multiplayer mode 
- Choose the difficulty mode: sandbox, real life or online
War never changes. In 1985 USSR went down before an unknown enemy. In a few days the entire country became a radioactive wasteland - violence, hunger and diseases reign here now. When you no longer loose in the fight with the death, the other survivors wait for you in the cooperative - the Online mode let you survive together dealing with difficulties, talking in the chat room and sending gifts to each other.

tr.releaseNotes: Play The Game of Life 2 face-to-face with your friends wherever you are, with in-game video chat! Spin the spinner and share the fun and laughter every step of the way!
tr.description:
Live 1000 lives in the official sequel to the classic family board game, The Game of Life! Will you be a Video Blogger or an Astronomer? Play now!

Voted "Best Digital Board Game” in the Pocket Gamer Awards 2021
Played by over 50 Million Families Worldwide

Customise your peg, hop in your eco car and race your friends and family through The Game of Life 2! It’s a contemporary sequel to the classic family favourite board game, The Game of Life. With an added crossroad moment and new ways to win, what will you choose? Earn points for Knowledge and Happiness as well as Wealth. Go to College, or don’t. Get married early, save it for later, or stay single! Have kids, adopt pets, do both or neither. The choices are all yours, and every decision counts!

Features

The Game of Life 2 digital board game is the award-winning sequel to the original Hasbro board game, The Game of Life.
• A GAME FOR UP 4 PLAYERS - Join 3 of your favourite people and live your dreams
• *NEW*  VIDEO CHAT AND PLAY - Live every life face-to-face with in-game video chat
• AN AD-FREE GAME - Enjoy the complete game with no interruptions
• 6 TRANSLATIONS - English, French, Spanish, German, Italian and Brazilian Portuguese
• SINGLE PLAYER - Take on our challenging AI
• ONLINE MULTIPLAYER - Connect with fans, or invite friends and family to a private game
• PASS & PLAY - No internet? No problem! Pass a single device between players for a wifi-free experience

How to play

CUSTOMISE your character
Customise your pink, blue or newly available purple peg with a style all of your own.

SPIN THE SPINNER
The game starts with a big decision. Will you go to College or straight into work? In this classic simulation, what will your friends and family choose?

It’s your LIFE PATH
Get married or don’t, have kids, adopt pets, or both! Work as a Pet Groomer, then qualify and become a Wind Turbine Technician! The choices are yours!

More WAYS TO WIN
Earn points for every choice you make! Every choice increases your wealth, happiness or knowledge, so every decision is valid.

RETIRE your way
Continue living the life of your dreams! Relax in a luxury home, or hit the road and fulfil your bucket list! Unlike the classic board game, you can choose to venture on!

Earn REWARDS to UNLOCK new items
Unlock new pegs, outfits and vehicles by playing the game and earning rewards!

In-game Video Chat
Recreate the magic! Gather around the board with in-game video chat in Online Multiplayer Mode. It’s super easy to set-up and play:

• Create your free private account
• Invite your friends and family to chat groups
• Start games straight from those chats
• Play face-to-face wherever you are

It’s simple, seamless fun for everyone.

The Ultimate Life Collection
Venture into a collection of 10 amazing fantasy worlds. Live life in enchanted worlds, make friends with dinosaurs in the Age of Giants and launch into the futuristic Lunar Age! Every new world features new Outfits, Vehicles, Jobs, Properties and more!

tr.description:
SEIZE FORBIDDEN TREASURES. SUMMON ALIEN GODS. FEED ON YOUR DISCIPLES.

BE WARNED. This game has no tutorial - part of the challenge is figuring out how to play. It's hard, but keep trying, and you'll master it. Good luck!

In this infamous roguelike narrative card game, play as a seeker after unholy mysteries in a 1920s-themed setting of hidden gods and secret histories. Become a scholar of the unseen arts. Craft tools and summon spirits. Indoctrinate innocents. Seize your place as the herald of a new age.

Cultist Simulator was first released on PC and has more than 200,000 players all over the world. Now we’re bringing the cosmic mysteries of Cultist Simulator to mobile.

• Challenging roguelike gameplay - There is never only one history.
Cultist Simulator doesn’t hold your hand. Experiment, expire and transcend death with a story-driven legacy system. Over time you’ll learn enough to wrestle the game to its knees.

• Intense, immersive narrative – Combine cards to tell your own story.
A hefty novel’s worth of choice-based storytelling, from the creator of Fallen London and Sunless Sea. There are many paths through this game of ambition, appetite and abomination, and many ways your tale can end.

• A rich Lovecraftian world – Corrupt your friends and consume your enemies.
Search your dreams for sanity-twisting rituals. Translate grimoires and glean their lore. Penetrate the realm of the Hours and win a place in their service. Cultist Simulator brings the peripheral horror of Lovecraft’s tales to an entirely new setting.

Expand your knowledge with the DLCs: New Legacies, New Ascensions, New Mechanics...
• The Dancer - Join the Bacchanal
• The Priest - Knock, and Ye Shall Be Opened
• The Ghoul - Taste of the graveyard's fruit
• The Exile - Some there are who will not yield

If you encounter any issue with the game, please click on “Contact us” at the bottom of this page and give us as many details as possible regarding the issue and your device: https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/11-cultist-simulator/?p=ios

tr.description:
Have you ever struggled to find confidence on stage or inspiration in the studio? AeroPads cues immersive pads and soundscapes that inspire and equip you to perform and write your best.

ENHANCE YOUR SOUND. ENGAGE YOUR AUDIENCE.
Every musician has experienced an empty mix or an awkward transition. When using AeroPads, you instantly add more dimension and character to your sound. With a more immersive mix and the ability to perform smooth and seamless transitions, you will feel more confident while your audience will be more engaged.

FOR EVERY MUSICIAN.
Pads and soundscapes are a versatile accompaniment to nearly any style of music. Whether you are a soloist or full band, AeroPads will take your sound to the next level. Rock bands, worship teams, wedding singers, producers, songwriters, and instrumentalists are just a few of the many types of musicians that have loved using AeroPads.

DESIGNED FOR THE STAGE. INSPIRED BY SPACE.
AeroPads features creative and immersive soundscapes paired with a beautiful and intuitive interface, all inspired by the pinnacle of exploration and inspiration: outer space.

CREATIVITY THAT SPARKS CREATIVITY.
AeroPads aren't your typical pads. Most pads out there are really boring or insanely obnoxious. However, AeroPads features thoughtfully crafted soundscapes that are meticulously fine-tuned with the perfect amount of harmonic and textural movement. Simply put, AeroPads won't step on the toes of your arrangement or get on the nerves of your sound guy (like most other pads out there).


Highlighted Features:
- A beautiful space-inspired interface with a simple and intuitive design.
- Live View: Every key and three of your favorite patches are instantly accessible (best suited for experimentation, free-flowing sets, and songwriting).
- Setlist View: Plan and build a detailed setlist (best suited for structured sets and seamless transitions).
- The iconic Atmosphere Soundpack which includes five unique patches named after and inspired by the layers of Earth's atmosphere. 
- Three patches can be added to Live View to be made instantly accessible, so there's no need to dig through menus to just to change a patch when performing live.
- Additional patches and Soundpacks available for purchase.
- Key-specific pads in multiple tonalities: major, minor, and neutral.
- Concert pitch adjustment.


How to Use:
01. Cue a pad that matches the key of your musical arrangement.
02. Play overtop of the accompanying pads and soundcapes.
03. Enjoy the boost of audience engagement, musician confidence, and creative inspiration.

Pads and soundscapes are intended as a subtle accompaniment to musical arrangements/performances. They are designed to be cued according to the key of the arrangement. Once cued, you'll hear a droning pad centered around the root note with additional harmonic textures within the selected key. The only time a pad's key should change within a song is in the instance of a key change. For best results, mix AeroPads appropriately within the overall mix. When mixed too loud, AeroPads may compete with melodies and the arrangement. When mixed too quietly, AeroPads may be less effective. When mixed appropriately, they will sound awesome.

本次更新：
1.优化了赛博护士的对话体验
tr.trackName: 赛博神医-猜病每日挑战小测验
tr.description:
想尝试医生护士的日常，却没时间读医学院？
这款应用让你随时随地体验医生护士的日常生活！
医疗模拟新体验，轻松解锁白大褂技能！

1. 【速诊挑战】
1. 面对真实病例，60秒内给出诊断
2. 越准越快，评级越高（S级大神就是你！）
3. 从菜鸟到专家，四级难度逐步挑战
4. 解锁医生职称，从实习医生晋升到主任医师
2. 【赛博护士】
1. 与难缠的患者实时对话，每次对话都是独特体验
2. 遇见各类"脾气"患者——焦虑的、生气的、怀疑的，用沟通技巧征服他们
3. 通过选择合适的回应，提升患者好感度，达95%即可通关
4. 患者情绪实时变化，你的每句话都在影响治疗结果
3. 【赛博医生】
1. 当一次赛博医生，对话诊断患者疾病；
2. 多样化病例库：每个难度对应不同疾病类型，从常见病到罕见疾病
3. 计时挑战：在有限时间内完成诊断，考验反应速度和专业判断

特色功能
1. 医学情景高度还原：基于真实医疗场景设计
2. 多样化患者反应：不再是固定剧本，每次对话都充满惊喜
3. 进度保存：随时暂停，随时继续你的医疗生涯
4. 无需专业知识：即使零医学背景也能轻松上手

用户真实评价
"下班后的解压神器！通关的成就感比打游戏还爽！" 
"原来哄病人开心这么有技巧，学到了!" 
"医学生表示很实用，临床实习前的热身工具" 
不需要医学背景，不需要专业知识，只要你对医疗世界有一点好奇心，这款应用就能带给你全新体验。
立即下载，今天就成为口袋里的神医！

Tired of boring backgrounds? Unleash your creativity with Deco and design stunning, unique wallpapers for your iPhone Lock Screen and Home Screen! Go way beyond the defaults and make your device truly yours.

Photos: Bring your memories to life! Use your own photos as backgrounds – Deco can even intelligently separate the subject* so your stickers tuck neatly behind (or in front of) it.
Gradients: Blend gorgeous, smooth color transitions with an easy-to-use editor and inspiring presets. Perfect for subtle or vibrant looks.
Stripes: Design chic and custom stripe patterns. You control the colors, angle, spacing, and background for endless possibilities. Presets help you get started fast.
Color: Sometimes simple is best. Pick the exact solid color that matches your mood or theme.
Image Playground: Feeling adventurous? Generate completely unique scenes using the magic of AI directly within Deco*.

Add Your Personal Touch:
Stickers: Layer on the fun! Add text, your favorite emoji, unique stickers (including Genmoji*). Place them anywhere you like – they'll look great even on different screen sizes!

Simple, Powerful, Yours:
Deco makes advanced customization easy and fun for everyone. It combines powerful features with a beautiful, intuitive interface. Deco won in the Swift Student Challenge 2025.

(Subject Separation, Image Playground, and Genmoji require compatible devices and iOS versions supporting these Apple Intelligence features.)

(iPadOS support and optional iCloud Sync planned for future updates.)

Core Game Rule:
- Defence your base
- Destroy all enemy tanks

Key Features:
- Different type of enemy
- Different type of Map style
- Special items
- Auto Helper tank
- Import Super Tank Battle 500 Legend maps

Infinity Tank Battle will continue update, our target is over 1000 map. And this game is cross-platform, you can find it on mobile, PC, and Mac.
